channel.title: Alpha Bug Reports
channel.description:
If you find an in-game bug please post a reply using the format listed below. Discussion of bugs is encouraged.
[u]Bug report format[/u]
Description:
Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high):
Videos/Photos:
[u]Example[/u]
Description: None
Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): 1
Videos/Photos: None

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Yep I need to fix this I know exactly what’s causing it. Thanks bud.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Description: The arms on platebodies disappear when logging out and back in, or while putting on other equipment.

Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): 10

Videos/Photos:

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

The scripts in the client play the sound effect even if you can’t activate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Description: Can’t activate piety and chivalry? I assume prayer doesn’t work, but why does it send me the sound like I can’t activate it?

Does this mean that we players aren’t marked as members in the client? If so, how can we wear abyssal whips? :s

Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): ?

Videos/Photos:

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Not a bug, the player updating procedure explicitly has a portion where you can write a single tile, even while running. It’s just not used by people, ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Description: If you click an object for an action (such as a door, a tree), you start walking like super slowly (even slower than walking).

Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): 8

Videos/Photos:

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

It’s not configured to update the client sided configuration and your variables won’t currently save either.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Description: If you click the run button from the settings tab, the config doesn’t update in both the gameframe and setting.

Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): 0

Videos/Photos:

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

I’ve experienced this as well and I think its a limitation to the amount of data that can be sent in a route with the client expecting you to reset or set the flag to the end of the route. (As perceived by the server) because the data I get from the client is limited to exactly that path. I will fix the visual effect of this, and recheck to make sure that this is indeed the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Alpha Bug Reports
item.dc:creator: @shappeh shappeh
item.description:
@shappeh wrote:

Description: Setting a marker that requires the user to find a path by traveling significantly farther away causes the marker to be cleared after a certain distance has been traveled. Try moving to Black Knights’ Fortress and setting a marker at the top of Ice Mountain. The marker will be cleared before the player can reach the entrance of Ice Mountain.

Reproduction rate (0-low/10-high): 10

Videos/Photos: None

Read full topic
